### dropRedundantKnowledge() {#a0879506ce04a79b173daca40d1967e35}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AssumeBundleBuilder.cpp&#125;::AssumeSimplify::dropRedundantKnowledge ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Remove knowledge stored in assume when it is already know by an attribute or an other assume.

This can when valid update an existing knowledge in an attribute or an other assume.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/assumebundlebuilder-cpp/#l00395">395</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/assumebundlebuilder-cpp">AssumeBundleBuilder.cpp</a>.
